404.description: Bad Request - Usually if the requesting account has no account or charge code settings

get.summary: Returns a single record for a user

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of user models to update

get.summary: Returns a list of user objects, by searching for user codes

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of user codes to search for

example.Message: The details provided do not match an API authorised account. Please ensure that your details are correct. Contact support for further information.

JobTitle.description: Job title. Appears on signed timesheets for approvers

JoinDate.description: Join date. Defines the first day which the user is able to submit timesheets / expenses

LeaveDate.description: Defines the last day the user is allowed to access the system

CompanyReg.description: (Limited company contractors) Employment company registration number

VatNumber.description: (Limited company contractors) Employment company tax number

TaxRateCode.description: (Limited company contractors) Employment company default tax code

TaxNumber.description: PAYE employees - Unique tax reference or other local tax number

EnableSelfBilling.description: Set to true to enable self billing for the user

AllowViewOwnSelfBillingInvoices.description: Set to true to enable access for the user to view self billing invoices produced for them

SelfBillingPaymentTerms.description: Payment terms for self billing invoices created

NextOfKin.description: HR module - Next of kin name

NextOfKinRelationship.description: HR module - Next of kin relationship

NextOfKinContactDetails.description: HR module - Next of kin contact details

Email.description: User's email address. This must be unique across all user accounts including approvers and administrators

UserCode.description: Unique user code. This code is used to identify whether user being posted is new or an update to an existing user

AccountingCode.description: Accounting code is usually used to reference payroll numbers in downstream systems

SendNewAccountEmails.description: [DEPRECATED] Set to true if you want to send a welcome email to the new user

SendNewAccountEmail.description: Set to true if you want to send a welcome email to the new user

DisableEmailVerification.description: Set to true if you are using single sign on. This will prevent the warning shown for a user to validate their email address

DisablePasswordSet.description: Set to true if you are using single sign on. This will hide the password reset controls from the user's profile page

UseAccountDefaultWorkingDays.description: If true then we derive the working days from the account default settings
